Steps.Message: Update at 09:16- Our engineers have investigated and found that the power is off due to a fault on our overhead network which has affected our substation equipment. A specialist team are on site and are in the process of diverting power around the fault. Considering the work that may be required, the revised estimated time to have the power back on is between 09:00 and 10:00. We're sorry to change the time, we will keep you updated.

We became aware of a power cut at 05:05. We’re sorry for any disruption this may have caused you. We didn’t know in advance there would be a power cut but now that we know, our teams will do everything they can to get your power back quickly.
Steps.Name: Power cut reported

Steps.Message: We have engineers on their way. As this is affecting your area, they will not need to attend your property. Rest assured once they arrive, they’ll work as quickly as is safely possible to get your power back on.
Steps.Name: Engineers on their way

Steps.Message: Engineers are now on site, carrying out investigations into the fault. Once they have completed their assessment, they will carry out repairs.
Steps.Name: Engineers investigating and fixing

Steps.Message: All power in the area should be back on. We’re really sorry for any disruption this caused.
Steps.Name: Power restored

Logs.Comment: Update at 09:16- Our engineers have investigated and found that the power is off due to a fault on our overhead network which has affected our substation equipment. A specialist team are on site and are in the process of diverting power around the fault. Considering the work that may be required, the revised estimated time to have the power back on is between 09:00 and 10:00. We're sorry to change the time, we will keep you updated.

IncidentCategoryCustomerFriendlyDescript: A fault occurred on a piece of our electrical equipment which controls the power to your home.
